lead_paragraph: STOLZBERG--Julie. The Dalton community mourns the passing of Julie Hiraga Stolzberg, beloved alum ('90), remarkable parent, and gifted teacher for fourteen years. Hundreds of students, their families, and her Dalton peers were blessed by her expertise, beautiful friendship, and deep passion for children and teaching. We extend our deepest sympathies to her devoted husband and former faculty member Craig, and to her children, Emi ('27) and Tai ('29). The Dalton School has lost an extraordinary member of its family who always will be remembered and deeply loved. Ellen C. Stein, Head of School 1/3
